name: PKPaymentButton
desc: An object that displays a button either to trigger payments through Apple Pay or to prompt the user to set up a card.

items.name: init(paymentButtonType: PKPaymentButtonType, paymentButtonStyle: PKPaymentButtonStyle)
items.desc: Creates a new payment button with the specified type and style.

items.name: enum PKPaymentButtonType
items.desc: The Apple Pay button types you can display to initiate Apple Pay transactions.

items.name: enum PKPaymentButtonStyle
items.desc: A type that indicates the available appearances for an Apple Pay button.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The radius, in points, for the rounded corners on the button.
